text: a five-year-old boy and his younger
sister were among the victims of
Baghdad's deadliest bombing in more than
three months a cruel reminder that
recent peace gains are tenuous at best a
minibus packed with explosives destroyed
a marketplace on Tuesday and set an
apartment building on fire killing 63
people and wounding at least 75 the
Shiite neighborhood of herria has been
the scene of vicious ethnic cleansing in
the past some fear Tuesday's attack will
spark a new round of tit-for-tat
killings between Sunni and Shia many
herria residents who accused Sunnis or
the u.s. of being behind the blast part
of a plot they say to continue to
destabilize Iraq listen me will issue it
has nothing to do with the Sunnis it has
nothing to do with us she is he's not
the Sunnis who detonated this vehicle it
was the Americans who exploded the
vehicles there is no one else the
displaced Sunnis come back to the
neighborhood they are all poor hungry
people who wanted to live they wanted to
get back their families and houses this
was done by the Americans so they keep
the Sunnis there and she is here they
don't want people to live in harmony
because she was a out on your phone up
well they bring them in with cars full
of bombs and explosives to destroy our
people no one has claimed responsibility
for the rush-hour blast in an area
packed with shoppers US army officials
blamed it on highly trained
iranian-backed shiite militia
lapeer Takeshima one min yet my house
was completely destroyed nothing was
left from my house I was outside the
house and my son had just got back home
when the explosion happened so he could
get out immediately but my sister-in-law
was still at home and she was completely
burned along with her husband Suzanne
Ibrahim was bringing her friends
two-year-old son home from the hospital
this morning he was among those injured
in the blast others were not so lucky
workers at the academy a hospital morgue
said they received 31 bodies John did
look what this explosion has done to the
people so many innocent people what was
their sin may God give them nothing what
are those innocent people guilty of what
are those kids guilty of
